GitHub Repository Topics
========================

To add topics to your GitHub repository:

1. Go to https://github.com/npequeux/mytop
2. Click "Settings" tab at the top
3. Scroll down to the "Topics" section (should be near the top)
4. Click the gear icon to edit topics
5. Add the following topics (copy-paste, separated by spaces):

rust system-monitor terminal-ui tui ratatui performance-monitoring gpu-monitoring npu-monitoring system-information cli-tool btop monitoring-tool intel-arc system-stats

6. Click "Save changes"

These topics will help users discover your project when searching on GitHub.
